usage: get               : get a value from the package.json
set               : set a value in the package.json
help <command>    : get help for the specified command
--indent <num>    : will indent json output the specified number of spaces
--file <filename> : will use specified json as input / output file

get: Gets the value for the specified key and prints it to stdout.
set: Sets the given key to value and saves the package.json.
unknown command: get            : get a value from the package.json
set            : set a value in the package.json
help <command> : get help for the specified command
